ModMetaData.name: Biomes! Oasis
ModMetaData.author: The Biomes Mod Team
ModMetaData.description: In the vast, merciless desert, there exist small spots of life and color. Areas rich in groundwater, or where the rainwater pools together in sufficient quantities to support a thriving and unique ecosystem: The Chromatic Oasis! Here you find rare plants and animals, from the magnificent gem scorpion to the nourishing aquamelon. Build your colony here, among the palms and the reeds, and show the desert that you do not fear it.
